languages.text: "Сплетение вероятностей, что даст рождение новой эпохе. Инквизитор использовал тебя, чтобы заполучить могучее орудие, что сокрушает миры. Вернее, его часть. Он знал, что переходит черту, а посему скрыл свой план даже от союзников — от тебя и щенков, звавших себя Волками. Тебе следует направиться по его следу, чемпион. Инквизитор наверняка попытается завершить орудие — это и станет моментом твоего истинного триумфа. Ведь ты заберешь его себе".

"Intertwining probabilities that will give rise to a new era. The Inquisitor has used you to obtain a weapon with the power to obliterate entire worlds. Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies: both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."
languages.original_text: "Сплетение вероятностей, что даст рождение новой эпохе. Инквизитор использовал тебя, чтобы заполучить могучее орудие, что сокрушает миры. Вернее, его часть. Он знал, что переходит черту, а посему скрыл свой план даже от союзников — от тебя и щенков, звавших себя Волками. Тебе следует направиться по его следу, чемпион. Инквизитор наверняка попытается завершить орудие — это и станет моментом твоего истинного триумфа. Ведь ты заберешь его себе".

Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies — both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon, and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: “无数可能性交织在一起，可能会开创新的时代。那个审判官利用你获得了一件足以毁灭无数世界的武器，或者说，是那件武器的一部分。他很清楚这样的做法超越了职权，因此他没有告诉任何人，就连你和那些自称‘野狼’的小狗崽都被蒙在鼓里。你应该跟踪他的下落，勇士。审判官可能会打算完成那件武器，而那将会是你真正胜利的时刻。等他完成那件武器之后，你就可以将它夺走了。”
languages.original_text: "Intertwining probabilities that will give rise to a new era. The Inquisitor has used you to obtain a weapon with the power to obliterate entire worlds. Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies: both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."

traits.locale_text: “无数可能性交织在一起，可能会开创新的时代。那个审判官利用你获得了一件足以毁灭无数世界的武器，或者说，是那件武器的一部分。他很清楚这样的做法超越了职权，因此他没有告诉任何人，就连你和那些自称‘野狼’的小狗崽都被蒙在鼓里。你应该跟踪他的下落，勇士。审判官可能会打算完成那件武器，而那将会是你真正胜利的时刻。等他完成那件武器之后，你就可以将它夺走了。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Verwobene Wahrscheinlichkeiten, die den Beginn einer neuen Ära darstellen. Der Inquisitor hat Euch genutzt, um eine Waffe zu beschaffen, die ganze Welten auslöschen kann. Oder besser gesagt einen Teil dieser Waffe. Er wusste, dass er eine Grenze überschreitet, daher hat er seinen Plan selbst vor seinen Verbündeten verborgen: sowohl vor Euch als auch vor den Welpen, die sich selbst Wolves nennen. Ihr solltet ihm folgen und ihn aufspüren, Champion. Der Inquisitor wird vermutlich versuchen, die Waffe zu vervollständigen, und das wird der wahre Augenblick Eures Triumphs werden. Wenn denn sie erst vollständig ist, werdet Ihr sie an Euch nehmen."
languages.original_text: "Intertwining probabilities that will give rise to a new era. The Inquisitor has used you to obtain a weapon with the power to obliterate entire worlds. Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies: both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."

traits.locale_text: "Verwobene Wahrscheinlichkeiten, die den Beginn einer neuen Ära darstellen. Der Inquisitor hat Euch genutzt, um eine Waffe zu beschaffen, die ganze Welten auslöschen kann. Oder besser gesagt einen Teil dieser Waffe. Er wusste, dass er eine Grenze überschreitet, daher hat er seinen Plan selbst vor seinen Verbündeten verborgen: sowohl vor Euch als auch vor den Welpen, die sich selbst Wolves nennen. Ihr solltet ihm folgen und ihn aufspüren, Champion. Der Inquisitor wird vermutlich versuchen, die Waffe zu vervollständigen, und das wird der wahre Augenblick Eures Triumphs werden. Wenn denn sie erst vollständig ist, werdet Ihr sie an Euch nehmen."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: «Un entrelazamiento de probabilidades que dará lugar a una nueva era. El Inquisidor te ha usado para obtener un arma con el poder de aniquilar mundos enteros. O más bien parte de dicha arma. Sabía que estaba cruzando una línea, así que ocultó sus planes incluso a sus propios aliados: a ti y a esos cachorros que se hacen llamar Lobos. Deberías seguir su rastro, adalid. No me cabe duda de que el Inquisidor tratará de completar el arma, y ése será el verdadero momento de tu triunfo; pues una vez completa, serás tú quien la tome».
languages.original_text: "Intertwining probabilities that will give rise to a new era. The Inquisitor has used you to obtain a weapon with the power to obliterate entire worlds. Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies: both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."

traits.locale_text: «Un entrelazamiento de probabilidades que dará lugar a una nueva era. El Inquisidor te ha usado para obtener un arma con el poder de aniquilar mundos enteros. O más bien parte de dicha arma. Sabía que estaba cruzando una línea, así que ocultó sus planes incluso a sus propios aliados: a ti y a esos cachorros que se hacen llamar Lobos. Deberías seguir su rastro, adalid. No me cabe duda de que el Inquisidor tratará de completar el arma, y ése será el verdadero momento de tu triunfo; pues una vez completa, serás tú quien la tome».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: « Un ensemble de probabilités qui s'entremêlent pour donner naissance à une nouvelle ère. L'inquisiteur s'est servi de vous pour acquérir une arme capable d'anéantir des mondes entiers... ou plutôt, une partie de cette arme. Il savait qu'il dépassait les bornes, aussi a-t-il caché son plan à tous, même à ses alliés : vous et les chiots qui se prennent pour des loups. Vous feriez mieux de le traquer, {mf|champion|championne}. L'inquisiteur tentera certainement d'assembler l'arme, et alors viendra votre véritable triomphe, car une fois qu'elle sera terminée, c'est vous qui vous en emparerez. »
languages.original_text: "Intertwining probabilities that will give rise to a new era. The Inquisitor has used you to obtain a weapon with the power to obliterate entire worlds. Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies: both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."

traits.locale_text: « Un ensemble de probabilités qui s'entremêlent pour donner naissance à une nouvelle ère. L'inquisiteur s'est servi de vous pour acquérir une arme capable d'anéantir des mondes entiers... ou plutôt, une partie de cette arme. Il savait qu'il dépassait les bornes, aussi a-t-il caché son plan à tous, même à ses alliés : vous et les chiots qui se prennent pour des loups. Vous feriez mieux de le traquer, {mf|champion|championne}. L'inquisiteur tentera certainement d'assembler l'arme, et alors viendra votre véritable triomphe, car une fois qu'elle sera terminée, c'est vous qui vous en emparerez. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: 「新時代を起こす交錯した確率だ。異端審問官は、全世界を消滅させる力を持つ武器を手に入れるために、お前を利用した。いや、むしろその兵器の一部だ。彼は自分が一線を越えていることを知ってたんだ。だからその計画を味方、つまりお前と自らをウルフと呼ぶ仲間のどちらにも隠したんだ。王者よ、彼を追跡してくれ。ロード・インクィジターはおそらく武器を完成させようとするだろうし、それがお前の真の勝利の瞬間となるだろう。なぜなら、それが完成した時、お前はそれを手にいれるんだからな」
languages.original_text: "Intertwining probabilities that will give rise to a new era. The Inquisitor has used you to obtain a weapon with the power to obliterate entire worlds. Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies: both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."

traits.locale_text: 「新時代を起こす交錯した確率だ。異端審問官は、全世界を消滅させる力を持つ武器を手に入れるために、お前を利用した。いや、むしろその兵器の一部だ。彼は自分が一線を越えていることを知ってたんだ。だからその計画を味方、つまりお前と自らをウルフと呼ぶ仲間のどちらにも隠したんだ。王者よ、彼を追跡してくれ。ロード・インクィジターはおそらく武器を完成させようとするだろうし、それがお前の真の勝利の瞬間となるだろう。なぜなら、それが完成した時、お前はそれを手にいれるんだからな」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Yeni bir çağın yolunu yapacak, iç içe geçmiş olasılıklar. Engizisyoncu, dünyaları yok etme gücüne kadir bir silahı, daha doğrusu silahın bir parçasını ele geçirmek için seni kullandı. Sınırı aştığını biliyordu, bu yüzden planlarını müttefiklerinden dahi gizledi... Yani hem senden hem de kendileri Kurtlar diyen o köpek yavrularından. Onun izini sürüp peşine düşmelisin müdafi. Engizisyoncu, muhtemelen silahı tamamlamaya uğraşacak. Sen de gerçek zaferine kavuşacaksın. Çünkü silah tamamlandığında el koyacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Intertwining probabilities that will give rise to a new era. The Inquisitor has used you to obtain a weapon with the power to obliterate entire worlds. Or rather a part of that weapon. He knew he was crossing the line, so he concealed his plan even from his allies: both you and the pups who called themselves Wolves. You should follow and track him, champion. The Inquisitor will likely attempt to complete the weapon and that will be the true moment of your triumph. For, when it is completed, you are going to take it."
